timeline.message:
Fix missing 2.5.6-SNAPSHOT changes

Signed-off-by: Kai Kreuzer <kai@openhab.org>

replies.bodyText:
Difficult to say - it is what the bnd autoresolver makes out of it. Interestingly, the last time it was switched from logback to slf4j, see https://github.com/openhab/openhab-addons/pull/7447/files.
@cweitkamp Did you do that change manually and purposefully at that time?
replies.author: kaikreuzer

replies.bodyText: I did not change anything manually. Only use -DwithResolver flag. Looking at the history of those files it seem to swap more often. Do you think it can be related to the Java platform?
replies.author: cweitkamp

replies.bodyText:
Possibly, yes.
But let's leave it this way - I would want to avoid too many manual changes and rather rely on what the bnd resolver creates as it has to live with that :-) .
replies.author: kaikreuzer

replies.bodyText: I can give it a try tomorrow. I have OpenJDK and Oracle Java available. If we prefer ch.qos.logback.classic for itests we can put slf4j.simple onto the runblacklist.
replies.author: cweitkamp

replies.bodyText:
I don't really have any preference. Does it make any difference wrt logs from the test?
Sure, feel free to test, but let us merge this nonetheless already tonight, so that all the other PR builds do not fail anymore, ok?
replies.author: kaikreuzer

replies.bodyText:
Yes, of course. I do not want to delay this.
AFAIK we do not use any specific features from one or the other implementation. I do not expect any differences for our setup.
replies.author: cweitkamp
